add_library(material_color_utilities
  STATIC
    include/material_color_utilities/blend/blend.h
    include/material_color_utilities/cam/cam.h
    include/material_color_utilities/cam/hct.h
    include/material_color_utilities/cam/hct_solver.h
    include/material_color_utilities/cam/viewing_conditions.h
    include/material_color_utilities/contrast/contrast.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dislike/dislike.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/contrast_curve.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/dynamic_color.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/dynamic_scheme.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/material_dynamic_colors.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/tone_delta_pair.h
    include/material_color_utilities/dynamiccolor/variant.h
    include/material_color_utilities/palettes/core.h
    include/material_color_utilities/palettes/tones.h
    include/material_color_utilities/quantize/celebi.h
    include/material_color_utilities/quantize/lab.h
    include/material_color_utilities/quantize/wsmeans.h
    include/material_color_utilities/quantize/wu.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_content.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_expressive.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_fidelity.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_fruit_salad.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_monochrome.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_neutral.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_rainbow.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_tonal_spot.h
    include/material_color_utilities/scheme/scheme_vibrant.h
    include/material_color_utilities/score/score.h
    include/material_color_utilities/temperature/temperature_cache.h
    include/material_color_utilities/utils/utils.h
    cpp/blend/blend.cc
    cpp/cam/cam.cc
    cpp/cam/hct.cc
    cpp/cam/hct_solver.cc
    cpp/cam/viewing_conditions.cc
    cpp/contrast/contrast.cc
    cpp/dislike/dislike.cc
    cpp/dynamiccolor/dynamic_color.cc
    cpp/dynamiccolor/dynamic_scheme.cc
    cpp/dynamiccolor/material_dynamic_colors.cc
    cpp/palettes/tones.cc
    cpp/quantize/celebi.cc
    cpp/quantize/lab.cc
    cpp/quantize/wsmeans.cc
    cpp/quantize/wu.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_content.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_expressive.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_fruit_salad.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_monochrome.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_neutral.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_rainbow.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_tonal_spot.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_vibrant.cc
    cpp/scheme/scheme_fidelity.cc
    cpp/score/score.cc
    cpp/temperature/temperature_cache.cc
    cpp/utils/utils.cc
)

target_include_directories(material_color_utilities PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
